Usage Examples
==============

The following examples illustrate how to use the **mgconfig** package in your project.

   :maxdepth: 1

   doc_example_1_basic

You can find all `code examples on GitHub <https://github.com/moenus/mgconfig/tree/main/example_usage>`_   

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   doc_config_def_1

You can find all `configuration definition examples on GitHub <https://github.com/moenus/mgconfig/tree/main/config_defs>`_   


The following code examples are provided:

- **basic** (see page :doc:`doc_example_1_basic`)
    - accessing a configuration value

- **intermediate** (see page :doc:`doc_example_2_intermediate`)
    - changing a configuration value

- **advanced** (see page :doc:`doc_example_3_advanced`)
    - reading multiple configuration definition files
    - handling of protected configuration items (config type 'secret')

- **extended** (see page :doc:`doc_example_4_extended`)
    - setting additional defaults at runtime
    - setting default functions
    - defining additional custom config types
    - defining a post-processing pipeline
    - adding custom config values at runtime
